children.name: facility_list_yn
children.label: Is this facility on your facility list?

children.name: facility_ID

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Please double check your 4-letter Facility ID

children.label: Please enter the UID exactly as it appears on your facility list:

children.name: zone
children.label: In which Zone is this facility located?

children.name: state
children.label: In which State is this facility located?

children.name: lga
children.label: In which LGA is this facility located?

children.name: ward
children.label: In which Ward is this facility located?

children.name: community
children.label: In which Community is this facility located?

children.name: facility_name
children.label: What is the name of this facility?

children.name: religious_only
children.label: Religious education curriculum only (Almajiri, Tsangaya, etc.)

children.name: integrated
children.label: Integrated curriculum (Religious education with integrated curriculum)

children.name: education_type
children.label: What type of education does this facility provide?

children.name: education_type_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: primary_and_junior_sec
children.label: Primary and Junior Secondary school combined

children.name: junior_and_senior_sec
children.label: Junior and Senior Secondary school combined

children.name: primary_junior_and_senior_sec
children.label: Primary, Junior and Senior Secondary school combined

children.name: facility_type
children.label: Facility Level - pick one of the following that best describes this facility:

children.name: facility_type_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: management_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: note_num_students_total_gender
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter "0" if there are none and "999" if unknown
children.label: How many students are currently enrolled at this facility?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of male and female students should equal total number of students.

children.name: num_students_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why the number of students is unknown:

children.name: note_num_tchrs
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter "0" if there are none and "999" if unknown
children.label: How many full-time teachers teach at this facility?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of teachers must equal the sum of male and female teachers.

children.name: num_tchrs_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why the number of teachers is unknown:

children.name: num_tchrs_with_nce
children.hint: Enter "0" if there are none and "999" if unknown

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of teachers with NCE qualifications cannot exceed the total number of teachers.

children.label: How many full-time teachers teaching at this facility have Nigerian Certificate in Education (NCE) qualifications?

children.name: num_tchrs_with_nce_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: num_classrms_total
children.hint: Enter "0" if there are none and "999" if unknown
children.label: What is the total number of classrooms, including those under construction, at this facility?

children.name: num_classrms_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: num_classrms_repair

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Number of classrooms in need of repair cannot exceed the total number of classrooms

children.label: Out of the total number of classrooms, how many are in need of repairs?

children.name: num_classrm_w_chalkboard
children.hint: Enter "0" if there are none and "999" if unknown

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Number of classrooms with blackboards cannot exceed the total number of classrooms

children.label: How many classrooms have a usable blackboard at this facility?

children.name: num_classrm_w_chalkboard_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: protected_well
children.label: Protected Well with tight-fitting cover that fully covers well opening

children.name: improved_water_supply
children.label: Which of the following IMPROVED water points are used by the facility and located within 100 meters of the facility?

children.name: improved_water_functionality
children.hint: Select ONLY one. Stolen could be considered 'Not Functional' but if it is stolen please specify by selecting 'Stolen'
children.label: From the following list, please choose the answer that best describes the overall condition of the improved water point(s) TODAY:

children.name: improved_water_functionality_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: pit_latrine_with_slab
children.label: Regular pit latrine with concrete slab

children.name: flush
children.label: Flush or pour-flush toilet connected to sewer, septic tank or pit latrine

children.name: improved_sanitation
children.label: Which of the following IMPROVED sanitation facilities are on the premises of the facility?

children.name: num_toilets_total
children.hint: Enter "0" if there are none and "999" if unknown
children.label: How many improved toilets are at this facility? Count each individual stall/door as 1 toilet.

children.name: num_toilets_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: power_sources
children.label: What type(s) of power sources are available at this facility?

children.name: phcn_electricity
children.label: Is the facility connected to the grid (PHCN / NEPA)

children.name: phcn_functional
children.label: Is the grid connection (PHCN or NEPA) functional? Functional means that there has been power for at least 1 hour within the last week.

children.name: phcn_functional_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: solar_functional
children.label: Is the solar system functional? Functional means that there has been power for at least 1 hour within the last week.

children.name: solar_functional_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: generator_functional
children.label: Is the generator functional? Functional means that there has been power for at least 1 hour within the last week.

children.name: generator_functional_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: grid_proximity_if_not_connected
children.label: How close do you estimate that the power lines of the electricity grid (like NEPA or PHCN) are to this facility?

children.name: grid_proximity_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

children.name: contact_name
children.label: What is the name of the main contact person for this facility?

children.name: contact_phone
children.label: What is the phone number of the main contact person for this facility?

children.name: contact_phone_dontknow
children.label: Please explain why this is unknown:

facility_type.name: primary_and_junior_sec
facility_type.label: Primary and Junior Secondary school combined

facility_type.name: junior_and_senior_sec
facility_type.label: Junior and Senior Secondary school combined

facility_type.name: primary_junior_and_senior_sec
facility_type.label: Primary, Junior and Senior Secondary school combined

improved_water_supply.name: protected_well
improved_water_supply.label: Protected Well with tight-fitting cover that fully covers well opening

improved_sanitation.name: pit_latrine_with_slab
improved_sanitation.label: Regular pit latrine with concrete slab

improved_sanitation.name: flush
improved_sanitation.label: Flush or pour-flush toilet connected to sewer, septic tank or pit latrine

education_type.name: religious_only
education_type.label: Religious education curriculum only (Almajiri, Tsangaya, etc.)

education_type.name: integrated
education_type.label: Integrated curriculum (Religious education with integrated curriculum)
